document_name_accent: hoi chung suy giam mien dich.json
document_title: What is immunodeficiency syndrome? Causes and symptoms
subsection_content: Primary immunodeficiency is caused by genetic defects and is difficult to detect, often occurring in children with a variety of symptoms depending on the type they have. Even if not detected and treated promptly, the patient can easily die. Meanwhile, with secondary immunodeficiency, the body gradually loses the ability to defend itself or is weak in defense against harmful agents, causing health to gradually weaken.
subsection_title: hoi chung suy giam mien dich.json. Symptoms
subsection_data:
hoi chung suy giam mien dich.json. Symptoms
Primary immunodeficiency is caused by genetic defects and is difficult to detect, often occurring in children with a variety of symptoms depending on the type they have. Even if not detected and treated promptly, the patient can easily die. Meanwhile, with secondary immunodeficiency, the body gradually loses the ability to defend itself or is weak in defense against harmful agents, causing health to gradually weaken.
